1.content:
Dawn has risen over the small farm were our beloved lil field mouse Mrs Brisby lived with her young children under a old tree stump in the corner of a corn field. We find our dear Mrs Brisby out on her morning routine to gather some food for her and her young one. It was a normal day for the most part, she had noticed that the cat "dragon" has not been around lately when she picked up a scent... a sweet scene of something yummy & soon started to search for the source of the smell. a few moments go by when she found the source of the smell... it was a small wad of cheese out in the open.

"Is that cheese?" Brisby questioned as she looked around the field trying to see if any humans were around but came up with nothing so she slowly scurried over to the small was of cheese and gave it a good sniff "It is defiantly cheese" she said to her self as she was just picking it up there was a sound of a spring noise and with a loud clang a small cage sprang from the ground and closed all around her... she was trapped.

Brisby was in a state of panic was she was frantically trying to get out of the cage she was in but try as she must she couldn't squeeze out or pry open the cage. About 24 minute go by when a 2-3 humans in white coats came over to her cage, Brisby got a good look at the words on the coats which sent a chill up her spine.. It was NIMH. The scientists soon took her cage and loaded her into there transportation and headed back to the research facility.

Once inside they placed Brisby's cage onto a metallic table, brisby looked all around as her heart started racing as she darted her left and right eyeing all the terrifying thing in the dim lighted room as she saw the scientist were getting charts and a couple of needles filled with unknown substances...
1.title: And so it begins.

11.title: Inflation

114.content:
Mrs. Brisby Begins to frantically find the lock and get to freedom when a Hose is shoved in to her mouth. She tries to remove the hose but a large human hand pressing her paws to her sides. All she can do is watch and feel her stomach fill with water. She groans as her skin stretches and swells. *MMMMMMWWWWWWWW* Mrs Brisby tries to scream, yet to no avail.
Soon the hand lifts from her sides and The Round mouse tries to free herself from the water weapon only to find she can't reach the hose anymore. Then ...
114.title: A Mousy Water Balloon

1151.content:
A scientist walked over to Brisby's cage and lifted her up as well as a needle filled with a Pink substance and injected into her, Brisby let out a small gasp as the unknown substance was injected into her. Soon the scientist placed her back down into her cage, it wasn't long until brisby felt a warmth forming around her chest. Brisby fell onto her belly as the warmth turned into a somewhat painful heat.

Brisby panted as the pain stopped, what a relief she thought to herself until she felt something odd on her chest. As she looked down to her chest she noticed two small orbs on her and they seem to be growing! "W-what on earth is happening to me?!" Brisby squeaked as her new growing breasts started to grow even more & grow even faster then before.

Soon after about 5 minutes her new breasts were the size of...
1151.title: Breast expansion

How about these areas for inflation/expansion?

The frightened little mouse backed away only to find herself in the hands of the other man in a lab-coat. As much as she kicked and struggled her efforts were in vain. She felt the needle behind her. "AAAHHHHHHH!!!!!!!!" She Squeaked in pain. Later Mrs Brisby woke up...

choices: Mrs Brisby finds no one home.

She poked it to make sure it was real. "Oh Dear" She whined "It's huge! ". The mouse put her hands over new butt, Then she snapped back into reality and remembered. " Oh no what about the children !" She quickly ran for home.

choices: when her butt starts to grow again.
then She finds the children.(Who are amazed at her large rear.)
11521211.content: " Teresa , Timmy, Martin ,Cynthia !? " Mrs. Brisby shouted out of breath stumbling through her doorway. She could see her home was vacant of her children and the young mother mouse remembered where she had left them. " They must still be at the old tree stump in the corn field !" she gasped Then Mrs. Brisby made a run for the corn field at fast as her legs could carry her...
11521211.title: Empty home

choices: You like my butt don't you. "
You can play with my tush after we wake the others. "
115212112.content:
As she ran Mrs. Brisby realized the weight she had gained set her off balance.
She tried to change her posture when she tripped over a branch, This caused her to suddenly tumble through the corn field and land upside-down with her back at the tree stump she left her children at. "hhhhhhhhhhhmmmmmmm?" Mrs. Brisby heard from behind her, Then the mother mouse felt a pair of arms squeeze her waist and something rub against her Bloated Bottom. Mrs. Brisby looked behind her and screamed " Teresa , get up !".
"Huh? , Mom ? " The mouse-ling drowsily opened her eyes. " OH ! " Teresa gasped and released her Mom's legs. Mrs. Brisby then scrambled to her feet and brushes herself off. " Wow Mom " Teresa stared wide-eyed and poked at her mother's large butt. Mrs. Brisby then said " Teresa...
115212112.title: Cushy Awakening

1152121122.content:
Teresa blushed at her question, turning away and pulling back her paws. This was strange for both of them. After all, butts aren’t supposed to be liked… they were just sort of there. But Mrs. Brisby’s new, much larger, plumper tush… not only did Mrs. Brisby enjoy feeling it get poked and prodded, but Teresa enjoyed just how soft and squishy it was. Her butt cheeks were like two big, fluffy pillow! Of course, she tried to pretend she didn’t enjoy it, embarrassed. “W-well, I mean… your butt is so BIG now! And soft!” She coughed, trying to act natural. “What… what happened?”

“Oh, just those dirty humans again. It’s a long story…” Mrs. Brisby smiled over her shoulder as she wriggled her tush. “But if you like my tush, you can feel it all you want! You don’t have to be shy!” Teresa wanted to protest, but she was immediately mesmerized by the huge, fluffy rump which filled her entire field of view. Before she even knew what she was doing, her body acted on her own accord, and she placed her paws against the mouse’s tush and started kneading and massage at it, feeling the pillowy skin squishy beneath her fingers.

Mrs. Brisby smiled, shivering a bit at the sensation. Her butt was so sore and sensitive from its sudden growth… this massage felt amazing! All the tension she had been dealing with was quickly worked away. She leaned back into the massage, letting out a little satisfied sigh. Meanwhile, Teresa couldn’t help but step forward and just hug the giant tush, trying futilely to wrap her arms around Brisby’s incredibly wide hips. She doesn’t even come close, but she does enjoy resting against all the squishy fluffiness…

“Oooh… I didn’t realize just how much I needed a massage…” Brisby giggled, as she felt the small paws knead at her sensitive rump. Eventually, she ended up lying down on her belly, her tail swaying as her immense butt was up in the air. Without a moment’s hesitation, Teresa climbed on, laughing as she tried to keep her balance atop the two big, pillowy cheeks. Once settled, she started kneading it with all four of her paws at once, while Brisby cooed and shivered at the heavenly massage.

Brisby was consumed by bliss for a while… but eventually, she opened her eyes to realize the others have awoken! She held her breath as they stared in awe at her huge rump, waiting for their reactions...
1152121122.title: Rump Massage

115213.content: Does the mother mouse awaken in a vital chamber restrained by wire.
115213.title: Wired up?

1152131.content:
Mrs.Brisby Awakened to find herself in a rather large sphere, The frightened mouse tried to move only to find that she was constrained face down by a spiderweb of wires and felt a sensation under her tail. Mrs. Brisby (who was one step away from panicking ) looked behind her to see a tube pumping the strange pink formula into her rear. Each of the Mouse's cheeks were now the size of her body.
She tried to scream only to be stopped by the wire attached to her mouth. Now running out of options Mrs. Brisby struggled and kicked in an attempt to get free, only for her over sized bottom to shake and jiggle. Soon the pear figured mouse tired herself out. Her big butt continued to grow and Mrs. Brisby feared she had no way of stopping it. She simply laid down suspended in mid air by the wires. The mouse felt as her skin stretched and her cheeks swelled with the formula making them bigger, softer and rounder. Soon enough...
1152131.title: Tangled and growing

choices: But the tube won't come out.
11521312.content:
The poor Mrs.Brisby had been trying to fall asleep now the it was dark , but her worry and discomfort flooded her mind while her bloated bottom was swelling to where each cheek was the size of a tennis ball ( Which is really big to a mouse ). Then the motherly pear shaped mouse heard a high pitched voice saying " No, The other blue switch !"
Mrs. Brisby knew that voice anywhere " Teresa !? " She tried to call out even with a wire sover her mouth. The Sphere Mrs. Brisby was in was made of a one way glass like material so Mrs. Brisby couldn't see her kids and, without the laboratory lights on they couldn't see anymore than her silhouette.
" Told you she was in this one !" Martin's voice said.
" I just wanted to make sure it was her. " Timothy's voice replied.
" Don't Worwy(Worry) mommy we'll get you out !" Little Cynthia's voice peeped
" You can count on it !" Timothy said
" Hey , look i found the switch ! " Martin yelled.
Inside the Sphere Mrs. Brisby saw a hatch above her open and The figure of her eldest child Teresa drop down.
The Mouse-ling softly landed on her mother's ever growing bum. Mrs. Brisby turned her head to see her child standing up with a confused yet relaxed smile from her pleasant landing ,then felt her rump jiggle after her daughter patted the soft landing area.
Teresa looked forward and saw her mother's face staring back with a wire covering her mouth. "Mom !" the mouse-ling said as she pulled the wire off her mother's face. With a gasp and a few coughs the mother mouse croaked a Thank you due to the dryness of her throat .
Mrs. Brisby attention then turned to Cynthia who banged on the sphere saying " We save you mommy!".
"Yes you are she said back"
Teresa then looked up and called " Did anyone find the sharp tool yet !? "
" Yeah !" Timothy replied from atop the sphere carrying a sharp piece of glass.
He passed it down to Teresa who began cutting Mrs. Brisby's bonds.
" Teresa could you get that tube out of me ? " She politely directed her daughter.
"Out from where ? " Teresa asked then came to the realization of what the soft material was.
" MOM, you're HUGE ! " Teresa blushed wide-eyed and poked her mother's huge furry orbs .
" Teresa The tube ! " Her mother said with more urgency in her voice.
" O-Oh Yeah !" Teresa said waking from her trance.
She approached the tube when her mother worried " Teresa don't cut it , pull it out I don't want you coming in contact with who knows what is inside that tube. "
"Okay " Teresa grunted as she began to pull the tube out of her mother's behind.
11521312.title: Rescued by the kids

115213121.content:
"Martin help me out down here ! " Teresa Called. " I don't take orders from you !" Martin Rebelled. "Do you want to save Mom or not !" Teresa, groaned sick of Martin always refusing to listen to anyone.
" Martin-UH-Please " Mrs. Brisby Grunted.
"...Fiiine ! " Martin said " ... But, Not because you told me to."
And he jumped down and started to help pull out the tube with Teresa.
115213121.title: Group Effort

1152131211.content:
" It still (pant,pant) won't (pant,pant) come out !" Teresa Panted, as she collapsed down on her back upon her mother's enlarging rump.
" Well Teresa I'm going to free mom whether your helping me or not !" Martin sneered as he continued to pull.
" UUUUGGHHHHH!! " Mrs. Brisby grunted " Timothy please help your brother and sister ."
" UM-Uh-Okay." Timothy stuttered as he jumped down joining his brother and sister on his mom's bloating bottom.
" Whoa !" the mouse-ling exclaimed trying to keep his balance on his mother's large squishy cheeks.
"Oh that feels good !" Mrs.Brisby thought to herself, feeling her children step on her growing butt was like a massage.
The three soon were all on there feet ready to pull.
" 3.2.1.Pull !" Teresa Ordered her siblings, Timothy and a begrudging Martin.
1152131211.title: Even more group effort.

115213122.content:
"HHHHUUMMMMMM" Teresa grunted as she continued to pull out the tube when , *Splooosh* It had detached from her Mom.
"Got it Mom ! " Teresa Panted out of breathe. "oh no." she winced. For staring back at Teresa was a robotic claw like nozzle with a red light that could have been an eye. The tube Lunges at her and attaches itself to Teresa's...
115213122.title: Like Mother , Like Daughter

choices: Readers choice (anything involves Flattening or stretching)
141.content: Mrs Brisby watched as a scientist walked over to her cage, he reached down and grabs her, as he lifted her up he picked up a needle filled with a unknown white substance and injected it into her. Brisby let out a gasp as the needle was injected into her, after the scientist injected the last of the white substance he took her over to another table with two small machines, one of them was a small piston while the other was a small taffy puller as the scientist hooked her up to..

1411.content: The Small mouse struggled and kicked against the two large latex gloved hands pushing her limbs into place. Although she had fought fiercely her efforts were in vain. Mrs.Brisby felt an uncomfortable tug as the machine whirred to life. The Mouse believed it was the end for her. The machine clearly would pull her in two. She closed her eyes and waited for her last breath....she felt... queasy. Mrs.Brisby opened her eyes to see her midsection was stretching at unrealistic proportions. The question in her mind was rattling around. How did her tiny body not snap. She was stretching like....oh my goodness! "I'm being turned into Taffy!" Mrs.Brisby squealed realizing what was happening to her. Just then the machine stops.

choices: You my proceed. (inject and continue stretching)
Hold off for a moment (more stretching/taffying later)
14111.content: Slowly one of the scientists picked up a pair of tongs as well as a note pad, examining the stretched out mouse carefully stretching out part of her midsection with the tongs as he wrote down in his notes "Hmmm, The subject's body seems to be reacting well with the preonium serum." The scientist continued to exam her as he took a ruler and took her measurements "The subject's body has stretched out about five inches, I have noticed the subject's body seems to have a taffy like feel to it as I stretch it out with the tongs" the scientist pondered for a moment and turns to his colleagues "What do you think, maybe a 2nd dose of the serum will continue untill the subject turns completely into taffy?" He questioned as he prepared a second syringe and ready to inject.

info.brief_description: A little interactive of "The secret of NIMH" with Brisby going through some changes.
info.description:
Hello readers, do you like the move "The secret of NIMH"? well this little interactive wraps around our beloved lil field mouse Mrs Brisby. In this lil interactive Mrs Brisby finds her self being taken away by NIMH when she was out in the fields on the farm and the NIMH scientists are planing to do some experiments on Mrs Brisby.

Fan's of the movie can bring in some OC's that you have made (Human/Mouse/Rat/etc) But do keep the list short.

Brisby - You can do what you like with her with anything from Anthropomorphism / Inflation / pregnancy / breast expansion / milk/lactation/ milking, toony physics (like flattenings or being molded like clay) even combinations are ok. You can make her as big as you want.

Also if you choose the anthro choices you can make the situation a little more adult themed AKA, making love with the lights one. ;3

Do keep make sure you write more then just a small sentence for example "Brisby took a piece of grass and held it until she saw.." so please be a little more descriptive & thank you. :)

[Ref of what she would look like if anthro'd http://www.furaffinity.net/view/26031508/ ]
[Link no works, message me]

Things that are not allowed are listed below.
Scat
Waterworks
Diapers
Muscle growth (unless it she sporty buff, six pack abs)


Thank you for your time and I hope you enjoy this Interactive.
